content: continue to replace marker as rounds are worked you will have increased 8 stitches for a total of 30 stitches rounds 6-8 exsc to eor set up for round 9 starting at bor count back five sts and place a marker there will be 4 sts between the new marker and bor marker round 9 separating the thumb starting at bor exsc4 stitches slip_stitch next stitch together with the newly marked stitch this will separate the thumb from the hand ch1 exsc into the same stitch just first stitch not the one that it was slip stitched with and mark this as the new bor exsc into the next 21 stitches the last stitch will be the one with the new marker 30 stitches 22 for the hand and 8 separated for the thumb which will be worked after hand is completed work the hand rounds 1-7 exsc to eor fan trim round 1 *sc1 dc1 sc1 in next stitch skip next stitch repeat from * to last stitch slip_stitch to finish round cut 6 tail and secure end finish thumb add 6-8 tail where thumb joins hand ch1 to secure rounds 1-3 exsc8 stitches for thumb at the end of the last round slip_stitch next stitch to finish and secure end use tail to stitch any gaps where thumb connects to hand weave in all ends follow all the
